name: Ikhtu
description:
Hi Folks ğŸ–
ğŸ“—What is Ikthu?
An application that will guide you while observing the fish that Ikthu fish lovers will use.

ğŸ™ŒWhat have I done?
I designed visual languages and brand awareness with a new logo brand, color scheme, application, and mobile application.

ğŸ§ Where Did I Get Inspired?
The fish symbol used in the application icon is very common in the Black Sea, I prepared it with inspiration from anchovy.

An application that will guide you while observing the fish that Ikthu fish lovers will use.

While working on the application, I prepared an AR feature so that the users can follow the fish faster and find the specified location more easily than the map.

With the radar feature, I aimed to discover the fish around the user and get detailed information for the selected species.

The locations I placed on the main screen, I aimed to provide detailed information about the region to the tourists who will travel for fish tourism by providing detailed information for the locations where various fish species are located...
